import React,{useContext,useState} from 'react'; import './Checkout.css'; import {CartContext} from '../../Context/Cart'; export default function CheckoutBody(){ const{cartItems, totalItems}=useContext(CartContext); const {shippingFee,setShippingFee}=useState('0'); return(
